articles.content:

articles.author: Steph Kukuljan
articles.title: AOC, Cori Bush throw support behind UAW workers at rally in Wentzville - St. Louis Post-Dispatch
articles.description: U.S. Reps. Cori Bush and Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez visited the local UAW hall in Wentzville on Sunday to deliver a message to automakers: No deals, no wheels.
articles.content:
WENTZVILLE The auto workers strike here continued to draw political interest, this time attracting two prominent Democratic congresswomen to a rally for workers on Sunday.
